means: （鸽）咕咕地叫，发出鸽叫般的声音( coo的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: They came backstage afterward, cooing and toadying to him.
sentence.Network_cn: 她们随后来到后台，对他娇语谄媚。

sentence.Network_en: Pigeons fluttered in and out, cooing gently.
sentence.Network_cn: 鸽子们低声咕咕地叫着，扑扇着翅膀飞进飞出。

Suddenly found a group of animals in ji ji cooing with what , then to eavesdrop., 突然发现一大群小动物围在一起叽叽咕咕说着什么 , 便去偷听.

entry.tran: (鸽子等)咕咕地叫;发出咕咕声
entry.def: When a dove or pigeon coos, it makes the soft sounds that doves and pigeons typically make.

example.ex: Pigeons fluttered in and out, cooing gently.
example.tran: 鸽子们低声咕咕地叫着，扑扇着翅膀飞进飞出。

entry.tran: 低声说话;轻声地说;柔声细语
entry.def: When someone coos, they speak in a very soft, quiet voice which is intended to sound attractive.

example.ex: She paused to coo at the baby...
example.tran: 她停下来，轻声地对着婴儿说话。
“这是不是太不可思议了？”她低声说。

means.word_mean: 1. that is making a soft cry;
